definition.content: Track OpenAI usage, cost and performance. You can use this dashboard to monitor your API requests, token usage and track costs both in aggregate as well as by model.

**Further reading:**

- [Datadog OpenAI Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/)
- [Monitor OpenAI with Datadog Blog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-openai-with-datadog)
Monitor your OpenAI API request volume against the limits set for your org. You may get rate-limited by OpenAI if you breach this limit.
Monitor your OpenAI API Tokens per Min Usage against the limits set for your org. You may get rate-limited by OpenAI if you breach this limit.

definition.content:
OpenAI base model pricing (per 1K tokens)
- **gpt-4-turbo-preview**: $0.01 prompt, $0.03 completion
- **gpt-4**: $0.03 prompt, $0.06 completion
- **gpt-4-32k**: $0.06 prompt, $0.12 completion
- **gpt-3.5-turbo-1106**: $0.001 prompt, $0.00 completion
- **gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct**: $0.0015 prompt, $0.002 completion
- **gpt-3.5-turbo-0613**: $0.0015 prompt, $0.002 completion
- **gpt-3.5-turbo-16k**: $0.003 prompt, $0.004 completion
- **text-embedding-ada-002**: $0.0001
- **davinci-002**: $0.002
- **babbage-002**: $0.002
- **ada-001**: $0.0004
- **babbage-001**: $0.005
- **curie-001**: $0.002
- **text-davinci-001/002/003**: $0.02



https://openai.com/pricing (2023-11-06)

definition.title: Response Time to Prompt Token Ratio

definition.content:
Prompts and completions are sampled from the Datadog APM library integrations.

By default prompts and completions are sampled 100% on all spans. 

Logs are sampled at a rate of 10% by default when spans are sampled. 

See the [OpenAI integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openai/#log-prompt--completion-sampling) for how to configure this rate.
